title: Top / Mid / Jungle wanted for Cybergamer OOL.
body:
Hello All,

We are looking for 2-3 players to fill our sub slots for our core LoL team.

We are currently competing in cybergamers OOL ammature ladder and are ideally after subs who main Top/Mid/Jungle.

If this interests you, please e-mail management@qlickgaming.com with your in game name, champion pool and what roles you main.

Regards,

Bearabouts
Community Manager
Qlick Gaming
